name: The Escape Sequence
description:
Description:

Two prisoners are locked up in a prison and are on their way to escape it, but later find out some paranormal activities there. Find out what are the authorities of the prison up to.

Its an alpha version. Stay tuned for further updates and for new levels.

This is my very first indie game...looking forward for better projects...

You can follow me on Instagram : @rohan_202_

Not there on Youtube yet... but will be there soon :)!!!
